description: This file defines a React component for a Todo application, including component logic, state management, and rendering. It imports external modules like React, ReactDOM, and project-specific components and models.

classes.name: TodoApp
classes.description: Main React component managing the Todo list, including rendering, event handling, and state management.

methods.name: componentDidMount
methods.description: Initializes routing for different views (all, active, completed).

methods.name: handleNewTodoKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key down event for adding new todos when Enter is pressed.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Toggles all todos as completed or active.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the completion state of a specific todo.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Sets a todo into editing mode.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves changes to a todo and exits editing mode.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the Todo component with current state and data.
